source.name: Question1
source.instructions: **In the table select the correct statements for each number.**
source.text:
|**Number** |**Statement**| 
| :------: | :----------- |
| 1 | <<<found == False>>> |
| 2 | <<<(start + end) DIV 2>>>|
| 3 | <<<True>>>|
| 4 | <<<end = middle – 1>>>|
| 5 | <<<start = middle + 1>>>|
| 6 | <<<if found == True then>>>|
